body_html: We were originally thinking that when we looked into changing TH's size/stride semantics, it might be "easy" to also make things work with negative strides, but we ended up using all our engineering budget just on making zero-size dims and scalars work correctly.
body_text: We were originally thinking that when we looked into changing TH's size/stride semantics, it might be "easy" to also make things work with negative strides, but we ended up using all our engineering budget just on making zero-size dims and scalars work correctly.
body: We were originally thinking that when we looked into changing TH's size/stride semantics, it might be "easy" to also make things work with negative strides, but we ended up using all our engineering budget just on making zero-size dims and scalars work correctly.
